variants.name: white
variants.description: These bandages, woven from the **Blessed Threads of Sanctaith**, possess a soothing aura of **LUMIERE**. Traditionally used by the **Clerics of Solara**, they are known to quicken the healing of wounds and nullify the effects of poison. Rumor has it that the soul of **Sister Elira**, a martyred healer, lingers within each thread, ensuring that no injury treated with them is ever left to fester. Soldiers who wore these bandages during the **Siege of Moonshadow Keep** claimed to hear Elira's voice guiding them to safety in the fog of war.
